response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I believe it aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 7500}
